name: FlightService
0:
”Alexa, open Flight Service”
”Alexa, ask Flight Service for the METAR at bravo whiskey india”
”Alexa, ask Flight Service for help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flight service
des:
Leidos Flight Service provides METARs, TAFs, AFDs for airports requested by ICAO codes. Link your 1800WxBrief.com account to receive an updated brief on your filed flight plan before you depart.

Once talking to Flight Service, if you’d like to change the voice’s gender or speed, tell your device to “change voice gender” or “change voice speed”.

Try saying:

"Alexa, ask Flight Service for the METAR at Bravo Whiskey India"
or
"Alexa, ask Flight Service for my last minute check"
